name: Robotic Vectors
description:
Help a playful rogue A.I. conquer a facility by "infecting" robots and reaching your goal! Robotic Vectors is a pseudo-platformer in which you use robots as your means of transportation across the environment. Can you beat all six levels?

Robotic Vectors was a solo project made in 48 hours, for the second GMTK Game Jam. The theme was GENRE, but you can't MECHANIC: a game that fits a genre, but is missing a staple mechanic from that genre. Robotic Vectors is a platformer, but the player has no control over their movement input, not being able to move, jump etc. when they please.
